game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must explore the forgotten ruins to discover the lost artifact and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.description: You need to pass through the entrance of the ruins located in the eastern forest.
A powerful beast guards the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
Once the beast is defeated, claim the artifact from its pedestal.
